index.appDescription: If you are experiencing stress, tension or depression, you're in the right place! Listen and enjoy!
index.author: Arsen G.

about.title: About Us
about.text: This app helps to calm the human nervous system, creating a spiritually peaceful environment. It awakens a love for nature, helping a person feel calm and harmonious. A person will learn new things about the forest, rivers, birds and other wonders of nature, reconnecting with nature in a new way.

sounds.title: Relaxing Sounds
sounds.description: Relax with the sounds of nature: forest, sea, etc. Suitable for focusing, sleeping, or just peace.

exercise.title: Breathing Exercise
exercise.description: Follow the circle to calm your nerves, reduce stress, and restore harmony.

themes.title: Themes
themes.description: Choose a theme (Light or Dark), according to your preferred look or the system (default) theme

multilang.title: Multilingual UI
multilang.description: Use it in Armenian, English, Russian, or Georgian languages. More languages will be added soon.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for cannot be found. You may have entered the address incorrectly, the page has moved, or it may not exist.
notFound.metaTitle: Oops, this page was not found
